title: Lux hit boxes are so big she is broken
body: It's really not funny and getting seriously old having a lux throw shit at you with hit boxes the size of cho. Reminds me of mord. His q is like having a semi truck being dropped on top of your fucking head. Where is the fun in a game that was once somewhat balanced, now revolving around champs that require you to press a button and watch your enemy's hp disappear because you can hardly avoid hit boxes that take up half of your walking path.

Lux's hitboxes are not misleading; slender/small adc/support champions' hurtboxes are misleading. 

best examples I can think of are cait, karma, and lulu. karma and lulu can stand behind minions and still be hit by skillshots if they're close enough 

yasuo also has a ***MASSIVE*** hurtbox. big part of the reason why yasuo players take tower shots so frequently, then say, "I WASN'T IN TURRET RANGE"
